mention.text: Backed by public antipathy toward the Exxon Valdez oil spill disaster , Gov. Steve Cowper on Thursday
top executives from three of the seven oil companies that own the Alyeska Pipeline Service Co. earlier in the week
three of the seven oil companies that own the Alyeska Pipeline Service Co. earlier in the week
the three companies -- ARCO Alaska , BP America and Exxon USA --
the Alyeska Marine Terminal near the town of Valdez
a substantial potential risk of additional oil spill
72 hours of the order 's being signed
one tanker being loaded at a time until all designated cleanup equipment is in place
Alaska 's $ 10-billion Permanent Fund , a kind of super budget reserve , should any terminal shutdown last long enough to cause short-term funding woes for the state
a kind of super budget reserve
the third mate who was on the bridge of the Exxon Valdez when it ran aground
the bridge of the Exxon Valdez
Tom Kilpatrick of the California Maritime Academy
Hazelwood , who lives with his wife and daughter in the Long Island community of Huntington
The judge who had imposed the earlier bail
